Posts.Content: silphium wrote: I’m scheduled for a zometa infusion next week for osteoporosis. Has anyone had the infusion done anyplace other than their arms. Lymph nodes were removed from both arms so I’m hesitant to have the infusion in my arm. Thanks for any input. Sue Dx 2/27/2017, IDC, Left, Stage IIIB, Grade 3, 0/3 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Chemotherapy 3/17/2017 Adriamycin (doxorubicin), Carboplatin (Paraplatin), Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Taxol (paclitaxel) Dx 3/21/2017, IDC, Right, Stage IA, Grade 3, 0/4 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 8/24/2017 Lumpectomy; Lymph node removal: Sentinel Radiation Therapy 9/21/2017 Whole-breast: Breast Radiation Therapy 9/21/2017 Whole-breast: Breast, Lymph nodes Hormonal Therapy 11/26/2017 Tamoxifen pills (Nolvadex, Apo-Tamox, Tamofen, Tamone) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Zometa infusion other than arm silphium hugz4u

Posts.Content: Nov 22, 2018 05:27PM silphium wrote: Hi JoE777, thanks for the reply, I did relay my concerns to my MO, I’ll see what happens next Monday
